title: Bug 139346Using isTopN in table inside list group header doesn't work.
description: Bug 139346Using isTopN in table inside list group header doesn't work. Description:Using isTopN in table inside list group header doesn't work.Steps to reproduce:1.Insert a list with a group2.Insert a table to list group header3.Using Total.isTopN(row[],2,null,0) as filter expression in table item.4.PreviewResult:Only the first group displayed top 2 records, other groups kept display all records.
